description: Rhages bowl; with row of camels each of different color across center of inside of bowl; figures, falcons and arabesques above and below; border of conventional forms, possibly derived from inscription. The outside has border of freely drawn inscription in black. The colors are dull blue, red-brown turquoise blue, a lavendar-grey and black.
medium: Earthenware with overglaze painted polychromy, Minai ware
title: Bowl
